title: Survival Hero: Merge RPG
description: Survival Hero: Merge RPG is an action game in a fantasy world where you must battle with wild animals, evil monsters, and even scary dragons! Merge and equip your hero with a powerful weapon and strong cuirass. You have been called upon to save the world. Become an invincible knight or archer, try to level up, kill enemies, and buy and merge equipment to become stronger!
